name: Dispersia
description:
PSX style bhop speedrunning. 

Controls:

Standard WASD

Ctrl - Crouch + Slide

Right click is dash (once you get the orange cube)

F8 - resets personal best

C - saves position and rotation

V - sets position and rotation to last save (if none then puts you in the spawn)

The map:

To cross the bridge you have to let yourself fall to dash further.

Any questions msg in discord server :)

enjoy and go fast

Submit runs on discord: https://discord.com/invite/AWxEEMN
